thread.title: Apollo’s Assets Under Management, Revenue Rise

author: Austen Hufford
title: Apollo’s Assets Under Management, Revenue Rise

organizations.name: revenue rise apollo global management llc

text:
Apollo Global Management LLC reported rising assets under management and advisory fee growth in its latest quarter as the firm readies to invest its largest fund to date.
For its fourth quarter, the New York private-equity firm reported a profit of $189.3 million, or 92 cents a share, up from $167 million, or 87 cents a share, a year earlier.
